PageWidgetPortable.Title: Parágrafos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_CN_ADITIVOCLAUSULAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.CLAUSULAADITIVO = @CAMPO(HANDLE) AND A.CONTRATO = @CAMPO(CONTRATO) AND A.TIPO = @CAMPO(TIPO) AND A.ADITIVO = @CAMPO(ADITIVO))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2231_at3865_hsedef2bcf.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
